p: JR-141 was undetectable in the plasma 24 hr after administration in all patients. The plasma concentration profiles of JR-141 did not differ between the first and final (fourth) dosing ( Figures 2 and 3; Tables 3 and 4), indicating no accumulation of the drug under these conditions. JR-141 concentrations in the CSF were below the detection limit in all patients at 4–6 hr after the final dosing.
